an4.215:1: "Bhikkhus, one possessing four qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there. What four? One is of wrong view, wrong intention, wrong speech, and wrong action. One possessing these four qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there.
an4.215:2: "Bhikkhus, one possessing four qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there. What four? One is of right view, right intention, right speech, and right action. One possessing these four qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there."
